settings.title: What does the “total print size” include?
settings.text:
The total print size includes both the artwork itself and any optional border you’ve chosen. So if you add a border, the print will be larger than the artwork dimensions alone.

Why would I want a border on my print?

Borders make framing easier and more professional — especially if you're using a mount or mat. They also add a clean visual space around the artwork, letting it “breathe” on the wall.

settings.title: How do I calculate the total size of a print with a border?
settings.text:
Here’s a simple way to figure it out:

- Start with the size of the artwork (e.g. 30 cm x 40 cm).

- Add the border size to each side.

For example, a 5 cm border means:

- 5 cm on the left + 5 cm on the right = 10 cm extra width

- 5 cm on the top + 5 cm on the bottom = 10 cm extra height

✅ So your total print size would be 40 cm x 50 cm.

Example:

Can you give an example in inches?

settings.title: Can you give an example in inches?
settings.text:
Absolutely! If your artwork is 12 in x 16 in, and you add a 0.5 in border all around:

- Total width = 12 + 0.5 (left) + 0.5 (right) = 13 in

- Total height = 16 + 0.5 (top) + 0.5 (bottom) = 17 in

✅ Final print size = 13 in x 17 in

Example:

settings.title: Is the border printed or left blank?
settings.text:
Yes, the border is part of the printed image. It's printed as a clean, white (or slightly off-white) margin, depending on the paper tone, ready for framing. 

What resolution are your prints?

All our physical prints are produced at 300 DPI(dots per inch), which is ideal for crisp, high-quality fine art reproduction.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Yes! We offer free worldwide shipping on all physical items—canvas and fine art prints alike. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.text:
At Atelier Lumin, we offer free worldwide shipping on every order — whether you're decorating a flat in London or a lakeside cabin in Canada.

Our artwork is made to order and shipped via our global fulfilment partner, with production facilities located across the UK, Europe, North America, and beyond. This means faster delivery, lower emissions, and fewer customs delays.

Please find more details on More Infomration

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.text:
Yes, we also accept returns for damaged or defective items. Please contact us within 14 days of delivery with a photo, and we’ll arrange a refund or replacement.

You can find more details in our returns policy.

settings.title: Can I sign up to your newsletter?
settings.text: Yes! Just enter your email in the sign up form at the bottom of this page, and you’ll be added to our subscription list. You’ll be sent updates, exclusive offers, and much more.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.text: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.title: What kinds of products do you sell?
settings.text: We offer high-quality fine art and framed fine art prints, canvas and framed canvas prints. All physical products are printed by our trusted production partners and shipped directly to you.

settings.title: Who prints and ships the canvas and fine art prints?
settings.text: Our physical products are printed and shipped by a professional print partner to ensure museum-grade quality and reliable delivery.

settings.title: Can I get a custom size or colour?
settings.text: Custom requests are welcome! If you need a specific size or format, feel free to send us a message before purchasing.

settings.title: Will the colours match what I see on my screen?
settings.text: Colours may vary slightly due to screen settings and print materials, but we aim for the most accurate representation possible.
